Articles.Content: Hi. My d and a keys changed functions with the q and e keys how do i revert this?
Did you maybe switch to docking mode accidentally, or change the control part from which the keys are taking their orientation?

Look to the control input indicators at the bottom left of the screen. If they still properly correspond, that means there is an issue with the orientation of the control point of your vessel. If not, you can go to the settings in the main menu, control inputs, and change the buttons for roll and yaw.
I just realised i put the probe core on top of a rover base
